name: Firefox Reorder Menu Items
description: Reverts the annoying changes done to the Bookmarks and History menus from Firefox 6+ to the old Firefox 5 layout. Tested with Firefox 11-28/38.
additional_info: Before: http://i.imgur.com/VkvGcpg.png After: http://i.imgur.com/kFTANNo.png For reference: http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=2333669 MUST restart Firefox after Install or Enable/Disable. UPDATE: Added partial support for Firefox 29+ while still supporting older versions. To customize, (un)comment various sections. ********** In Firefox 29+ the bookmarks menu was overhauled.
